verses.name: Daniel 7:24
verses.text: And the ten horns out of this kingdom are ten kings that shall arise: and another shall rise after them; and he shall be diverse from the first, and he shall subdue three kings.

verses.name: Daniel 7:25
verses.text: And he shall speak great words against the most High, and shall wear out the saints of the most High, and think to change times and laws: and they shall be given into his hand until a time and times and the dividing of time.

verses.name: Daniel 7:26
verses.text: But the judgment shall sit, and they shall take away his dominion, to consume and to destroy it unto the end.
